name: Scalloped Potatoes
author: Martha J. Hamm
instructions: Cook potatoes for about 10 minutes in boiling salted water. Drain, reserving 1 cup water. Place potatoes in baking dish. Saute onion in 4 Tbsp. of melted butter in a saucepan; blend in flour. Add reserved water and milk. Cook, stirring until thick. Remove from heat; add cheese, salt and pepper to taste. Stir. Pour over potatoes. Bake for 30 minutes at 350Â°.
